Hi,

I’m a computer scientist, a wannabe mathematician/astronaut, and a photographer. My main research interests these days are in complex systems, data science, sensing, and data interpretation.

I work at the University of St Andrews and live in Kilconquhar in Fife. Originally I’m from Runcorn, just outside Liverpool in the north-west of England. I came to St Andrews by way of Newcastle upon Tyne, York, Oxford, Dublin, and Co Sligo: good luck tracing my accent.
